Package org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JSONReader
    A message body reader that converts a JSON entity stream to a map than can be used to construct Grails domain objects.
    JSONWriter
    Provider for Grails' JSON converter class.
    MessageBodyReaderSupport<T>
    Base class for simple message body readers.
    MessageBodyWriterSupport<T>
    Base class for simple message body writers.
    ProviderSupport  
    ProviderUtils
    Utility class related for MessageBodyReaderSupport and MessageBodyWriterSupport
    XMLReader
    A message body reader that converts an XML entity stream to a map than can be used to construct Grails domain objects.
    XMLWriter
    Provider for Grails' XML converter class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalTypeException
    Thrown to indicate that the type argument to MessageBodyWriterSupport or MessageBodyReaderSupport is not supported.
